wikipedia_page.main: Sir Henry Carstairs Pelly, 3rd Baronet (24 April 1844 - 4 June 1877) was a Conservative Party politician.

response: * Lady Lilian Harriet Charteris (1851–1914), who married Sir Henry Pelly, 3rd Baronet in 1872. After his death, she married Sir Henry Francis Redhead Yorke in 1882.

* David Alexander Edward Lindsay, 27th Earl of Crawford (1871–1940), who married Constance Lilian Pelly, second daughter and co-heiress of Sir Henry Pelly, 3rd Baronet, MP, and Lady Lilian Charteris (a daughter of Francis Charteris, 10th Earl of Wemyss), in 1900.
